location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 89 to Meer Ally Khan, Calantar [ Kalantaror Mayor] of Genowa [Bandar-e Ganaveh], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter in which Galley complains to Meer Ally Khan after a ship from Bussora [Basra] was wrecked near Genowa [Bandar-e Ganaveh] and the Indian servants on board were robbed and wounded (and the packets they were carrying read by Shaikh Salem).The letter reminds Meer Aly Khan of his friendship with the English and calls for the letters to be returned and the actions of Shaikh Salem to be investigated.
